did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Archives Foreign File (AFF), Section 2
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, Czechoslovakian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The Archives Foreign File is a collection of printed ephemeral documents, issued primarily by foreign and international trade unions and labor organizations. All continents are represented, though the majority of materials is of European origin. Topics covered in this collection include union organizing, unemployment, working conditions, the working class, the labor movement, industrial relations, worker education, international trade unionism, works councils, automation, economic conditions and trends, labor markets, foreign relations, and political movements, including fascism, socialism, and communism. Included in this collection are materials on the World Confederation of Labor and the World Federation of Trade Unions.
Due to the volume of material in this collection the finding aid has been divided into four sections.
Boxes 80-81 have not been inventoried at this time.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Archives Foreign File (AFF) #5582. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
